name: Simple Buttons Creator
author: Robby Chen

sections.description: A simple way to create buttons with many customizable options available. After a button is created, you can use a Simple Buttons Creator widget to display the button onto the page. This plugin has been tested with Page Builder by SiteOrigin.
sections.installation:
You can either:

  1. Upload unzipped simple-buttons-creator folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin Simple Buttons Creator through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. The Simple Buttons Creator menu can be found in the main menu of WordPress admin.

Or:

  1. Search Simple Buttons Creator in the Add New plugin section in WordPress admin and install it.
  2. The Simple Buttons Creator menu can be found in the main menu of WordPress admin.
sections.faq:
How can I contact you for some issues regarding the plugin?

You can contact me either through GitHub issues page or the WordPress support forum for this plugin at https://wordpress.org/support/plugin/simple-buttons-creator/.
